description: Normajean is an apprentice working at a Pokémon nursery school. She was caring for a Pichu, Cleffa, Teddiursa, Smoochum, Wynaut, Igglybuff and an Azurill when she met Brock and his friends on the boat to Twinleaf Town. While on board, the Pokémon in her care were attacked by shoal of Tentacruel. With Brock`s help, the Pokémon were all able to recover.
name: Nobuko
